==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|めい|もく|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=めいもく}} compound {{m|zh|瞑目|tr=meng? mjuwk|lit=closed eyes + eye}}.

A mixed reading, using the [[漢音#Japanese|''kan'on'']] for {{m|ja|瞑|tr=mei}} and the [[呉音#Japanese|''goon'']] for {{m|ja|目|tr=moku}}, so the reading likely shifted after the initial borrowing.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=on|めいもく|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

# [[closing]] of the [[eye]]s
